welcome_message_body: Welcome to charming Rochester, known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore the city and all it has to offer, from its vibrant arts scene to its picturesque parks and gardens. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Lipuma's Coney Island
restaurants.description: Lipuma's Coney Island is a hot dog joint located in Rochester.
restaurants.address: 621 N Main St (at W University), Rochester, MI 48307

restaurants.description: Downtown Cafe is a breakfast spot located in Rochester.

restaurants.description: The Meeting House is a american restaurant located in Rochester.

restaurants.name: Rochester Chop House
restaurants.description: Rochester Chop House is a steakhouse located in Rochester.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Rochester International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Greater Rochester International Airport is dedicated to domestic flights operated by American Airlines and Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Greater Rochester International Airport is dedicated to domestic flights operated by JetBlue and United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
